intro.title: Introduction
intro.text: DealMotion B.V. ("we", "us", or "our") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our AI-powered sales enablement platform.

dataCollected.title: Personal Data We Collect
dataCollected.intro: We collect the following categories of personal data:

account.title: Account Information
account.item1: Full name and business email address

content.title: Content You Create
content.item1: Prospect and contact information you enter
content.item2: Research notes, meeting preparations, and follow-up content
content.item3: Uploaded documents to your knowledge base
content.item4: Meeting recordings and transcripts (when using AI Notetaker)

purposes.title: How We Use Your Data
purposes.item1: Provide and improve our AI-powered sales enablement services
purposes.item2: Generate personalized research, preparation, and follow-up content
purposes.item3: Process payments and manage your subscription
purposes.item4: Send transactional emails (account updates, service notifications)

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.contractDesc: Processing necessary to provide the service you subscribed to
legalBasis.consentDesc: For optional features like calendar integration

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.intro: We retain your data according to the following principles:
retention.account: Account data: Retained while your account is active, deleted within 30 days of account deletion
retention.content: Content data: Deleted immediately upon account deletion
retention.billing: Billing records: Anonymized and retained for 7 years for tax compliance
retention.logs: Technical logs: Automatically deleted after 90 days

rights.title: Your Rights Under GDPR
rights.intro: As an EU resident, you have the following rights:
rights.accessDesc: Request a copy of your personal data
rights.erasureDesc: Request deletion of your personal data
rights.portabilityDesc: Receive your data in a machine-readable format
rights.objectionDesc: Object to processing based on legitimate interest
rights.withdrawDesc: Withdraw consent where processing is based on consent
rights.howTo: You can exercise most of these rights directly from your account settings (Settings тЖТ Privacy & Data). For other requests, contact us at privacy@dealmotion.ai.

transfers.title: International Data Transfers
transfers.intro: Some of our service providers are located outside the EU. We only use providers that:
transfers.safeguards: Have certified under the EU-US Data Privacy Framework (DPF), have signed Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs), or are located in countries with an EU adequacy decision.

subprocessors.title: Subprocessors
subprocessors.intro: We use the following third-party service providers:
subprocessors.name: Service
subprocessors.dpfNote: DPF = EU-US Data Privacy Framework certified

security.title: Security Measures
security.intro: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures:
security.encryption: Encryption of data in transit (TLS) and at rest (AES-256)
security.access: Role-based access control with principle of least privilege

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.essentialDesc: Required for authentication and session management
cookies.noTracking: We do not use tracking cookies or third-party advertising cookies.

complaints.title: Complaints
complaints.intro: If you believe we have not handled your personal data properly, you can lodge a complaint with your local data protection authority:

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.text: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes via email or in-app notification. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.text: For privacy-related questions or to exercise your rights, contact us at:

intro.title: Introduction
intro.text: These Terms & Conditions ("Terms") govern your use of DealMotion, an AI-powered B2B sales enablement platform operated by DealMotion B.V. By using our service, you agree to these Terms.

definitions.title: Definitions
definitions.serviceDesc: The DealMotion platform, including web application, APIs, and related services
definitions.userDesc: Any individual or entity that registers for and uses the Service
definitions.contentDesc: All data, text, files, and other materials you upload or create in the Service
definitions.subscriptionDesc: Your paid or free plan for accessing the Service

service.title: Service Description
service.intro: DealMotion is an AI-powered sales enablement platform that provides:
service.feature3: Post-meeting follow-up with action items and email drafts
service.feature5: Knowledge base for document storage and RAG-enhanced context

account.title: Account Registration
account.item1: You must provide accurate and complete registration information
account.item2: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account credentials
account.item3: You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized access
account.item4: One person or entity per account - sharing accounts is not permitted

responsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
responsibilities.item1: Use the Service only for lawful business purposes
responsibilities.item2: Ensure you have the right to input any data about third parties (prospects, contacts)
responsibilities.item3: Not misrepresent AI-generated content as human-written when legally required
responsibilities.item4: Maintain appropriate data protection measures for personal data you process

acceptableUse.title: Acceptable Use
acceptableUse.intro: You may not use the Service to:
acceptableUse.prohibited1: Violate any applicable laws or regulations
acceptableUse.prohibited2: Infringe on the intellectual property rights of others
acceptableUse.prohibited3: Harass, spam, or send unsolicited communications
acceptableUse.prohibited4: Attempt to reverse engineer, scrape, or access the Service in unauthorized ways
acceptableUse.prohibited5: Use the AI features to generate harmful, discriminatory, or illegal content

payment.title: Subscription & Payment
payment.item1: Paid plans are billed monthly or annually in advance
payment.item2: Prices are in Euros (тВм) and exclude applicable taxes
payment.item3: You can cancel your subscription at any time; access continues until the end of the paid period
payment.item4: No refunds for partial subscription periods, except as required by law
payment.item5: We may change prices with 30 days' notice; changes apply at your next renewal

data.title: Your Data
data.intro: Regarding data you store in the Service:
data.item1: You retain ownership of all User Content you create or upload
data.item2: You grant us a license to process your data to provide the Service
data.item3: We will not use your data to train AI models (other than your personal context within your account)

ip.title: Intellectual Property
ip.item1: DealMotion owns all rights to the Service, including software, design, and documentation
ip.item2: AI-generated content (research, briefs, emails) may be used freely by you for your business purposes
ip.item3: You may not copy, modify, or redistribute the Service or its components

ai.title: AI-Generated Content
ai.intro: The Service uses artificial intelligence to generate content. You acknowledge that:
ai.item1: AI-generated content may contain inaccuracies and should be reviewed before use
ai.item2: You are responsible for verifying facts and claims in AI-generated content
ai.item3: AI suggestions are assistance tools, not professional advice (legal, financial, etc.)

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.intro: To the maximum extent permitted by law:
liability.item1: The Service is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind
liability.item2: We are not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages
liability.item3: Our total liability is limited to the amount you paid in the 12 months prior to the claim

termination.title: Termination
termination.item1: You may delete your account at any time via Settings тЖТ Privacy & Data
termination.item2: We may terminate your account for violation of these Terms with prior notice
termination.item3: Upon termination, your data will be deleted according to our Privacy Policy
termination.item4: Sections on IP, Liability, and Governing Law survive termination

law.title: Governing Law
law.text: These Terms are governed by the laws of The Netherlands.
law.disputes: Any disputes will be submitted to the competent court in Amsterdam, The Netherlands.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.text: We may update these Terms with 30 days' notice for material changes. Continued use after the effective date constitutes acceptance.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: For questions about these Terms, contact us at:
